name: Pocket-Sized Titanium Fire Starter
description: Be ready for any adventure with this lightweight titanium fire starter. Featuring a waterproof tinder compartment and ferro rod, it's perfect for camping or emergencies. Attach it to your keychain and stay prepared anywhere.

name: Multi-Function Smart Wallet
description: This sleek RFID-blocking wallet includes a pop-up card holder, built-in power bank, and a tracker to prevent loss. Stylish and functional, it's a must-have for tech-savvy professionals.

name: Mini EDC Screwdriver Kit
description: Compact and convenient, this mini screwdriver kit comes with 10 precision bits for quick fixes on the go. Its keychain design makes it easy to carry anywhere.

name: Self-Defense Tactical Pen
description: This durable aluminum pen doubles as a glass breaker and self-defense tool, making it practical and protective. Sleek and discreet, it's perfect for everyday carry.

name: Magnetic Modular Key Organizer
description: Keep your keys and tools organized with this slim, magnetic modular key holder. Durable and stylish, it's perfect for a clutter-free pocket.
